answers.answer: Just wondering if you got the results of your last tests - any clues there?

question: I've had a series of symptoms over the past few months including- tingling in hands, feet and lips - feet burn when walking - comes and goes- localized cold sensation on skin – comes and goes- twitching – mostly legs and face – comes and goes- oversensitive skin that feels like it is sunburned when touched (all the time)- pain in hands, wrists, forearms, feet and ankles - comes and goes- Pain/tenderness in right armpit (occasional tenderness in left armpit)- Foggy mind, forgetful, sometime it is very difficult to concentrate, sometimes lose track of conversation- Tend to garble /slur words during normal conversation- Fatigued, lack of energy/motivation- Ear aches - comes and goes- Redness, inflammation and pain on face and neck that increases with sun exposure - acne breakouts (did not have acne before)I am 42 year old female.  I am not currently on any medications or supplements.  I have been seeing an internal medicine doctor and have eliminated autoimmune disorders, thyroid disorder, diabetes, connective tissue disorders, peripheral vascular disease and Lyme disease.  Pain in armpit was associated with pain in right breast, so we eliminated breast cancer.  The neurologist cleared me after electrocuting my hands and running MRIs of head, neck and thoracic.  My doctor ran some tests to see if there were any problems related to my plasma cells, but the test came back negative.  B12 and folic acid tests were normal.  White and red blood cells are normal.  Platelets will occasionally jump to just above the top range and then come back down.  My Dr believes those instances were due to a reaction to a specific event.My Dr sent me to an allergy/immunology doctor who ran an allergy test (allergic to dust mites which was known) and will be running blood tests for vitamin D deficiency and heavy metals.  No signficant stress in my life, in fact everything is going quite well, except for the health issues.  I don't believe I am premenapausal.Anyone have any other suggestions for additional tests or probable causes?Thanks
title: Sunburn feeling and concentration problems
